text: David Farrington Thornton (born June 12, 1953) is an American actor. He has appeared in John Q, Home Alone 3, Law & Order, The Notebook, and The Other Woman. He is the husband of Grammy Award-winning singer-songwriter Cyndi Lauper. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from South Carolina
title: David Thornton (actor)
